## Hasher.combine() method

Adds the given value to this hasher, mixing its essential parts into the hasher state.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
combine(value: unknown): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  value | unknown | A value to add to the hasher. |

<b>Returns:</b>

void
